definition: one of the Eight Trigrams 八卦[ba1 gua4], symbolizing mountain/☶/ancient Chinese compass point: 45° (northeast)

sentences.english: When you stop, you leave a mile long skid mark.

sentences.english: In addition to this, there is a different wear pattern between the top and the bottom knife.

sentences.english: His ankles look puffy and they pit when he presses them with his finger.

sentences.english: My ankles look puffy and there are dents in the skin when I press them.

sentences.english: Some stay for awhile and leave footprints on our hearts.

sentences.english: Dog carcass in alley this morning, tire tread on burst stomach.

sentences.english: I had a man once send me a chip of wood that showed the marks of a beaver's teeth.
sentences.chinese: 曾經有人送我一段木片，上面有山狸的齒痕。

sentences.english: The farm carts have worn ruts in this field.
